definition: festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]

sentences.english: Nunchaku is perhaps one of the most well recognized weapons in2)martial arts.
sentences.chinese: 雙節棍可能是武術中最爲人所熟知的武器。

sentences.english: When training with the nunchaku at first, be prepared to look like a bad comedy routine.
sentences.chinese: 開始學習雙節棍時，要有出洋相的心理準備。

sentences.english: Instructors were trained and big tournaments were organized.
sentences.chinese: 各地培訓雙節棍教練員，組織武術大賽，如火如荼。

sentences.english: Michaelangelo is the master of the whirling nunchakus.
sentences.chinese: 米開朗基羅是耍雙節棍的高手。

sentences.english: Chinese nunchaku tend to be rounded, whereas Japanese are octagonal .
sentences.chinese: 中國的雙節棍多是圓的，而日本的是八邊形的。

sentences.english: The traditional nunchaku is made from a strong, flexible hardwood such as oak, or loquat.
sentences.chinese: 傳統的雙節棍是由堅韌的硬木，如橡木或枇杷製成的。

sentences.english: Using nunchakus can be dangerous if you don't use them properly.
sentences.chinese: 雙節棍使用不當，是會很危險的。

definition: lit. one hundred shots, one hundred hits/to carry out a task with great precision/to shoot with unfailing accuracy/be a crack shot (idiom)
to drown sb in a wicker basket, a form of 沉潭[chen2 tan2]
please excuse me for not complying/to politely decline
lit. firing after the horse/fig. belated action/giving advice in hindsight
to gesticulate/to make lively gestures (while talking)/also written 比手劃腳|比手划脚
lit. spouting smoke through the seven orifices (idiom)/fig. to seethe with anger
to return something to its rightful owner
to claw wildly/to scratch frantically/to arrest people indiscriminately
